column5: Country road take me home! Just 7 miles from downtown Fredericksburg, 1.5 miles from world-famous Luckenbach! Follow our peaceful, private country lane that trails alongside hay fields, and a patch of forest to your very own relaxing getaway. Lücky Schwein Guest Haus is easily accessible, yet in the middle of hundreds of acres of fields and forests, making it a unique quiet country sanctuary. See our Mini cows and horses grazing in the field, visit with our pet pig Daisy, or Annie the farm dog.
